original: intros a b c H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply (Nat.lt_trans a b c) in H1. apply (Nat.lt_trans b c (power c 2)) in H2. apply (Nat.lt_trans (power a 2 + power b 2) (power a 2 + power b 2) (power c 2)). + apply (Nat.add_lt_mono (power a 2) (power b 2) (power a 2) (power b 2)) in H2. apply H2. + apply Nat.add_lt_mono_l. apply H1.
